name: Misutonia no Kibou: The Lost Delight
storyline: The story focuses on Rose Cottingley (first name can be changed) who once lived happily with her family in a peaceful town, she was a girl who loved fairy tales, until…. everything was taken from her. Her family, her future, her ordinary life. Everything was taken from her. 8 years later, she dons on a ‘mask’, entering a mansion under the pretense of being a maid when in reality she is seeking out justice for what had happened to her. She refuses to yield to anyone until she gets her revenge. This is her revenge story.
summary:
A otome game by Otomate set to release in 2024.

A fairy tale of love, obsession, and emotion woven together by descendants of fairies.
